reqs:
Pre-reqs: (FNEL102 in the same language.)
The usual prerequisite for this course is FNEL 102. The location of the class is on the Musqueam Reserve at the Musqueam Community Center, 6777 Salish Drive, Vancouver, B.C. Contact: Marny Point, marny.point@ubc.ca
description: Emphasis on increasing fluency in conversational ability, enhancing pronunciation and comprehension skills, expanding vocabulary, extending literacy and grammatical understanding, and further study of oral traditions in their cultural context.
